home_welcome_subtitle: Ready to continue your journey of faith today?
feature_prayer_sanctuary_desc: Speak your prayer aloud and receive a devotional reflection based on your words.
feature_chat_desc: Ask questions and receive Bible-based answers and personalized advice.
feature_community_desc: Connect with your congregation, share posts, and grow together in faith.
feature_bible_reader_desc: Access multiple versions, books, and chapters of the Holy Scripture.
feature_study_plans_desc: Generate personalized 7-day plans on any topic to deepen your knowledge.
feature_characters_desc: Explore detailed profiles of important figures from the Scriptures.
feature_journal_desc: Record your reflections, prayers, and learnings in a personal and secure space.
feature_hope_bridge_desc: Create pages with comforting messages to share with friends in need.
feature_feeling_journey_desc: Process your emotions in the light of the Scriptures with an AI-guided tool.
toast_data_error_desc: We couldn't load your profile. Please try logging in again.
toast_language_updated_desc: The interface has been updated to {{lang}}.
toast_model_updated_desc: The default AI model is now {{model}}.
toast_profile_error_desc: Could not save your profile changes.
toast_join_request_sent: Your request to join '{{name}}' has been sent to the administrators.
toast_join_request_error: Could not process your join request.
toast_prayer_interaction_error: Could not register your prayer interaction.
toast_not_authenticated: You need to be logged in to perform this action.
toast_circle_create_error: Could not create the prayer circle.
toast_already_a_member: You are already a member of this circle.
settings_subtitle: Manage your account and application preferences.
profile_subtitle: This is how others will see you on the site.
delete_account_confirm_desc: This action cannot be undone. This will permanently delete your account and remove your data from our servers.
join_congregation_desc: Enter the invite code you received from your church.
create_congregation_desc: Register your church to start your private community.
community_tooltip_leave_to_join: You must leave your current congregation to join another.
community_tooltip_leave_to_create: You must leave your current congregation to create a new one.
no_congregation_title: You are not part of any congregation yet
no_congregation_desc: Join an existing one with an invite code or create a new one for your church.
pending_request_desc: Your request to join '{{name}}' is pending approval from the administrators.
word_of_peace_title: A Word of Peace for Your Heart
error_circle_not_found_or_member: Circle not found or you are not a member.
no_description_provided: No description provided for this circle.
press_and_hold_prompt: Press and hold the button to join in prayer.
prayer_circles_subtitle: Join forces with brothers and sisters in specific prayer purposes.
empty_state_my_circles: You are not part of any circle yet. Join a public one or use an invite code.
empty_state_public_circles: There are no public circles available at the moment.
join_circle_desc_modal: Enter the invite code to join a private prayer circle.
toast_joined_circle: You have successfully joined the circle '{{name}}'!
onboarding_circle_desc_1: Welcome to the Prayer Circles, your new watchtower. Here, we unite for specific purposes, strengthening our faith together.
onboarding_circle_desc_2: Create or join rooms to pray for causes, people, or situations. Each member is a soldier in this spiritual battle.
onboarding_circle_desc_3: By holding the button, you signal that you are actively praying, and everyone in the room will know they are not alone.
create_circle_subtitle: Define a purpose and gather your brothers and sisters for prayer.
mission_desc: What is the main purpose of this prayer circle?
title_placeholder: E.g., For the health of John
description_placeholder: Detail your need. The clearer the target, the more precise the prayer.
ammunition_desc: Choose a Bible verse to serve as the foundation for this circle.
privacy_desc: Choose who can join this battle.
public_desc: Visible to the entire Verbo Vivo battalion.
